quest.name: Malodorous Mischief
journal: Tonaxia is beside herself in giggling glee.

Despite her attempts to play innocent, it is evident that Tonaxia is in need of ingredients for her latest prank. Strike out for Larkscall; slay a morbol, an old-growth treant, and two molted ziz; and harvest the malodorous items she seeks─a phial of morbol bile, a rotting acorn, and two phials of ziz venom, respectively.
The unpleasant creatures are no more, and their unpleasant remains are yours. Deliver the aforementioned goods to Tonaxia.
Tonaxia is pleased to receive the items she requested, and promises that you will not be the victim of her foul-smelling plot─provided, of course, you continue to do her bidding.
objectives: Defeat a morbol to obtain a phial of morbol bile.
Defeat an old-growth treant to obtain a rotting acorn.
Defeat molted ziz to obtain phials of ziz venom.
Deliver the requested goods to Tonaxia.

dialogue.name: TONAXIA
dialogue.text: This might be this one's most ingenious trick ever! This one cannot wait to see walking one's face when this one─oh?

dialogue.name: TONAXIA
dialogue.text: Trick? This one said nothing of the sort. This one thinks walking one's ears are the ones playing tricks.

dialogue.name: TONAXIA
dialogue.text: But perhaps walking one could help this one gather some valuable ingredients...since walking one seems to have free hands.

dialogue.name: TONAXIA
dialogue.text: This one requires one phial of morbol bile, one rotten treant acorn, and two phials of ziz venom─the stinkier, the better! Why, walking one asks? That is...ah, a secret.

dialogue.name: TONAXIA
dialogue.text: Larkscall is full of stinky ones. Walking one will find everything this one needs there.

dialogue.name: TONAXIA
dialogue.text: This one requires one phial of morbol bile, one rotten treant acorn, and two phials of ziz venom─the stinkier, the better! Why? Did this one not say it was a secret?

dialogue.name: TONAXIA
dialogue.text: Larkscall is full of stinky ones. Walking one will find everything this one needs there.

dialogue.name: TONAXIA
dialogue.text: Well, did walking one find what this one needs from stinky ones?

dialogue.name: TONAXIA
dialogue.text: Perfect! Yes, this will be the stinkiest trick ever! Tee hee hee!

dialogue.name: TONAXIA
dialogue.text: Do not worry, walking one, this one will not play it on walking one. As long as walking one keeps doing what this one says. Tee hee!
